陶俑.definition: a pottery figurine buried with the dead

陶冶.definition: lit. to fire pots and smelt metal; fig. to educate

陶冶情操.definition: to cultivate one's mind; to build character

陶哲軒.definition: Terence Tao, Chinese-Australian mathematician, Fields medalist in 2006

陶樂.definition: former Taole county, now in Pingluo county 平羅縣|平罗县[Ping2 luo2 xian4], Shizuishan 石嘴山[Shi2 zui3 shan1], Ningxia

陶樂縣.definition: former Taole county, now in Pingluo county 平羅縣|平罗县[Ping2 luo2 xian4], Shizuishan 石嘴山[Shi2 zui3 shan1], Ningxia

陶淵明.definition: Tao Yuanming (c. 365-427), Jin dynasty writer and poet

陶潛.definition: Tao Qian or Tao Yuanming 陶淵明|陶渊明 (c. 365-427), Jin dynasty writer and poet

陶行知.definition: Tao Xingzhi (1891-1946), Chinese educator and reformer

陶醉.definition: to be infatuated with; to be drunk with; to be enchanted with; to revel in
